src:
Union gazda Berlina, prvi gradski derbi pripao novajliji
02 Nov 2019, 20:44 by Darko
Union Berlin – Herta 1:0(0:0)Polter 90′
Mnogo uzbuđenja bilo je u istorijskom, prvom bundesligaškom, derbiju grada Berlina.
Meč je odlučen u 90. minutu, golom iz penala, koji je za domaćina Union dosuđen nakon gledanja snimka. Bojata je startovao na Gertnera, a sudija je odlučio da pokaže na belu tačku. To je izazvalo revolt navijača Herte, meč je bio i prekinut, a Sebastijan Polter je realizovao jedanaesterac.
Bilo je čak deset minuta nadoknade, ali Herta, za koju je igrao Marko Grujić, nije uspela da stigne do izjednačenja. U pobedničkom timu igrao je Neven Subotić.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
The boss of the Berlin Union, the first city derby to come to a newcomer
02 Nov 2019, 19:44 by Darko
Union Berlin - Hertha 1: 0 (0: 0) Polter 90 ′
There was a lot of excitement in Berlin's historic, first Bundesliga derby.
The match was decided in the 90th minute by a penalty kick, which was awarded to the host Union after watching the video. Boyata started on Gertner, and the referee decided to point to the white spot. This provoked a revolt by Hertha fans, the match was interrupted and Sebastian Polter scored a penalty.
There were even ten minutes of compensation, but Herta, played by Marko Grujic, was unable to reach the equalizer. Neven Subotic played on the winning team.
